subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin scored his first goal of the season Sunday, and the Washington Capitals became the last N.H.L. team to get a win, beating the visiting Buffalo Sabres, 3-2.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin scored his first goal of the season Sunday, and the Washington Capitals became the last N.H.L. team to get a win, beating the visiting Buffalo Sabres, 3-2.
